attributes.action: No Doms/Rich People Pay No Corporation Tax
attributes.additional_details:
non-doms": persons resident in the UK who are not domiciled here for tax purposes.

rich, untaxed foreigners. should not be taxed, but instead be asked to invest in UK.

If rich people invest money into the uk. They should not be taxed. In fact they should be given tax breaks.

A sensible government will always protect wealth creators and will never be tempted by short-term gains at the cost of longer-term losses.
